name: Fence2D
description:
A Simple local multiplayer fencing game made in a game jam, so it is in very early development and will be updated monthly until complete; feel free to comment any ideas for future updates! i just might use them ;)

controls:

  • Player 1: move with w, a, s, d and strike with n
  • Player 2: move with the arrow keys and strike with numpad 2

Enjoy!
